Deckard.name: Healing Potion
Deckard.description: Throw a Healing Potion on the ground that heals the first allied Hero that comes in contact with it for 230 (+4% per level).  Limit 5 active Potions.

Deckard.name: Horadric Cube
Deckard.description: Release the Horadric Cube. After 0.5 seconds it explodes, dealing 80 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies in the area and Slowing them by 35% for 1.75 seconds.

Deckard.name: Scroll Of Sealing
Deckard.description: Unfurl an enchanted scroll over 2.25 seconds, forming a triangle that deals 150 (+4% per level) damage to enemies inside and Roots them for 1.5 seconds.

Deckard.name: Stay Awhile and Listen
Deckard.description: After 1 second, Channel for 3 seconds, putting enemy Heroes in front of Deckard to Sleep while Channeling, and for 2 seconds after.  Enemies can only be put to Sleep once per cast, and Sleep's effects end instantly if they take damage.

Deckard.name: Lorenado
Deckard.description: After 1 second, create a twirling tome tornado that travels towards the targeted direction, continually knocking away enemies that come into contact with it.

Deckard.name: Fortitude of the Faithful
Deckard.description: When at least 1 other allied Hero is nearby, Deckard gains 10 Armor and his Basic Abilities recharge 50% faster.

1.name: Scroll of Identify
1.description: Quest: Hitting an enemy Hero with Scroll of Sealing reveals them for 8 seconds. Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes, Scroll of Sealing also reduces Armor by 15 for 4 seconds and the reveal duration is doubled.

1.name: Field Study
1.description: Each enemy Hero hit by Scroll of Sealing grants 15% Spell Power for 14 seconds, up to 30%.

1.name: Sapphire
1.description: Activate to increase the Slow of the next Horadric Cube by 30%.  Only 1 Gem may be active at a time.

4.name: Potion of Shielding
4.description: Whenever an ally is healed by a Healing Potion, they gain a 135 (+4% per level) Shield for 6 seconds.

4.name: Rejuvenation Potion
4.description: Healing Potions restore 10 Mana and heal for an additional 108 (+4% per level) over 4 seconds.

4.name: Ruby
4.description: Activate to make the next Horadric Cube spawn 3 Lesser Healing Potions from each enemy Hero hit, healing allied Heroes for 205 (+4% per level) when picked up. Lesser Healing Potions last for 10 seconds.  Only 1 Gem may be active at a time.

7.name: Cube Mastery
7.description: Each enemy Hero hit by Horadric Cube reduces the cooldown of Scroll of Sealing by 3 seconds.

7.name: Kanai's Cube
7.description: Horadric Cube reduces Hero damage dealt by 30% for 4 seconds.

7.name: Emerald
7.description: Activate to make the next Horadric Cube reduce healing received by 75% for 4 seconds.  Only 1 Gem may be active at a time.

10.name: Stay Awhile and Listen
10.description: After 1 second, Channel for 3 seconds, putting enemy Heroes in front of Deckard to Sleep while Channeling, and for 2 seconds after.  Enemies can only be put to Sleep once per cast, and Sleep's effects end instantly if they take damage.

10.name: Lorenado
10.description: After 1 second, create a twirling tome tornado that travels towards the targeted direction, continually knocking away enemies that come into contact with it.

13.name: Super Healing Potion
13.description: If a Healing Potion isn't picked up for at least 2 seconds, it heals for 75% more.

13.name: Potion of Revival
13.description: When a Healing Potion is picked up, it also heals all nearby allied Heroes for 30% of the healing amount.

13.name: Ancient Blessings
13.description: Activate Fortitude of the Faithful to empower nearby allied Hero Basic Attacks for 8 seconds, causing them to deal an additional 72 (+4% per level) damage in an area and heal for 106 (+4% per level) for each Hero hit.

16.name: Scroll of Stone Curse
16.description: Scroll of Sealing deals 200% more damage when hitting at least 2 Heroes.

16.name: Safety in Numbers
16.description: If at least 3 allied Heroes are nearby, Fortitude of the Faithful grants an additional 10 Armor and causes Deckard's Basic Abilities to recharge an additional 50% faster.

16.name: Horadric Staff
16.description: Every 5 seconds, Deckard's next Basic Attack Stuns Heroes for 0.75 seconds.

20.name: Respect the Elderly
20.description: Stay Awhile and Listen Silences and Blinds enemies for 2 seconds upon waking up from Sleep.

20.name: Morenados!
20.description: Lorenado's cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds every time an enemy Hero is knocked back. This effect can only occur once per 0.5 seconds.

20.name: Bottomless Flask
20.description: After use, Healing Potions recharge after 6 seconds.

20.name: Perfect Gems
20.description: Reduce the cooldown of all Gems by 25 seconds and the cooldown of Horadric Cube by 5 seconds.
